reference: Abowd, John and Orley Ashenfelter, Unemployment and Compensating Wage Differentials, in Studies in Labor Markets, edited by Sherwin Rosen, Chicago: University of Chicago Press, 1981.

Granger, C. W. J., Investigating Causal Relations by Econometric Models and Cross-Spectral Methods, Econometrica, 37 (1969), pp. 424-438.
